nl: If signal == level, then signal == level.
ltl: (G (Implies (== signal level) (== signal level)))

nl: If signal == level, then signal == level in the next cycle.
ltl: (G (Implies (== signal level) (X (== signal level))))

nl: If signal == level, then signal == level or signal == level in the next cycle.
ltl: (G (Implies (== signal level) (X (Or (== signal level) (== signal level)))))

nl: If signal == level, then $stable(signal/word) in the next cycle.
ltl: (G (Implies (== signal level) (X ($stable signal/word))))

nl: If signal == level and signal == level, then signal == level.
ltl: (G (Implies (And (== signal level) (== signal level)) (== signal level)))

nl: If signal == level and signal == level, then signal == level in the next cycle.

ltl: (G (Implies (And (== signal level) (== signal level)) (X (Or (== signal level) (== signal level)))))

nl: If $rose(signal), then signal == level.
ltl: (G (Implies ($rose signal) (== signal level)))

nl: If $rose(signal), then signal == level or signal == level.
ltl: (G (Implies ($rose signal) (Or (== signal level) (== signal level))))

nl: If $fell(signal), then signal == level.
ltl: (G (Implies ($fell signal) (== signal level)))

nl: If $fell(signal), then signal == level or signal == level.
ltl: (G (Implies ($fell signal) (Or (== signal level) (== signal level))))
